solution_line_template: Total number of shirts Sally sews is {shirts_monday} + {shirts_tuesday} + {shirts_wednesday} = <<{shirts_monday}+{shirts_tuesday}+{shirts_wednesday}={total_shirts}>>{total_shirts} shirts.
The total number of buttons she needs is {total_shirts} x {buttons_per_shirt} = <<{total_shirts}*{buttons_per_shirt}={total_buttons_needed}>>{total_buttons_needed} buttons.
